questions: What’s something you’re looking forward to this week?
If this month had a theme song, what would it be?
What is something you learned recently?
What’s a small gesture someone did that made you feel valued?
What’s one thing you wish others understood about you?
When was the last time you had a really meaningful conversation, and what was it about?
What’s a habit you’d like to start or stop?
What is sone thing you are proud of today?
How have you grown in the past months?
What’s the strangest thing you’ve ever eaten?
What’s a fictional place you’d love to visit?
If your life had a motto right now, what would it be?
